response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item is not just an object; it's a symbol of excellence and innovation. We believe its true value surpasses $800,000, reflecting its unparalleled quality and unique features. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an exceptional chance to own a masterpiece that could significantly enhance your collection or business. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
